Hair tie: A tie can be repurposed as a hair tie by cutting it into long strips and using the strips to tie back hair.
Bag handle: A tie can be used as a handle for a bag by cutting it into two equal lengths and attaching them to the top corners of the bag.
Book bookmark: A tie can be used as a book bookmark by folding it in half and placing the knot at the end of the book.
Gift tag: A tie can be used as a gift tag by writing the recipient's name and message on the fabric, then tying it around the gift.
Plant marker: A tie can be used as a plant marker by writing the name of the plant on the fabric and tying it around the stem.
